purpose: To provide a comprehensive SDK and CLI for integrating AI functionalities into Python applications
principle: Builds on LangChain and OpenAI to facilitate AI-driven tool calling and integration
reusability: Offers a Python SDK and CLI for easy integration into existing projects; supports API interactions
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential bugs
name: arcade-ai
highlight: Seamless integration of AI capabilities into Python applications via SDK and CLI
